name: Don't Kill, Ninja!
description:
Press Space to Jump!

The longer you go without killing anyone, the better you do!

Running into an enemy kills them, and when your ghostly pursuer grabs a hold of your victim's ghost, he gets a boost of speed! See how long you can last!

Made by Alex (hero) and Mario (neverender)

Ninja art used and based off of: https://luizmelo.itch.io/martial-hero-2

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/hero-immortal
